summary:
My first mod. I think that you need to activate the mode in NMM

Tagged all of the possible followers in the game essential so they cannot be killed
descriptionHtml:
INSTALLATION: Drag \\\\\\\"EssentialFollowers.esp\\\\\\\" into Data folder in Skyrim directory and activate using the NMM you can download it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/

This is my first mod.

The followers that I have tagged essential:

Erik the slayer

Jennessa

Marcurio

Meeko

Lydia

Stenvar

Vorstag

Belrand

Derkeethus

Vigilance

Stray Dog

Calder

Jordis the sword maiden

Iona

Argis the Bulwark

Ghorbash the Iron Hand

Lob

Adelaisa Vendicci

Ahtar

Annekke Crag-Jumper

Aranea Ienith

Benor

Borgakh the Steel Heart

Cosnach

Eola

Faendal

Kharjo

Mjoll the Lioness

Ogol

Roggi Knot-Beard

Sven

Ugor

Uthgerd the Unbroken

Golldir

Erandur (ALREADY ESSENTIAL)

Onmund

J\\\\\\\'zargo

Brelyna Maryon

Aela the Huntress

Athis

Farkas

Njada Stonearm

Ria

Torvar

Vilkas

The only follower I have not tagged essential is Illia because the Creation kit seems to have an issue with her I will fix this as soon as I can.

If you have an issue with this mod please post it in the comments :)
author: SeizureSandwich17
